name: roller-skates
effect: Allows the player to move quickly and off the grid.
short_effect: Allows the player to move quickly and off the grid.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Attaches roller skates to the bottom
of your shoes, allowing you to glide
quickly around and perform tricks.
